briefdescription.para: Check whether the node is a valid group node.
Check whether the node is a valid layer node.
Load the layer tree from an XML element.

detaileddescription.para: It is not required that layers are loaded at this point. resolveReferences() needs to be called after loading the layers and before using the tree.

briefdescription.para: Cast node to a group.

detaileddescription.para: No type checking is done - use isGroup() to find out whether this operation is legal.

simplesect.para: Not available in Python bindings, because cast is automatic.

briefdescription.para: Cast node to a layer.

detaileddescription.para: No type checking is done - use isLayer() to find out whether this operation is legal.

simplesect.para: Not available in Python bindings, because cast is automatic.

briefdescription.para: Cast node to a layer.

detaileddescription.para: No type checking is done - use isLayer() to find out whether this operation is legal.

simplesect.para: Not available in Python bindings, because cast is automatic.

briefdescription.para: Create a new empty layer tree.
Clear any information from this layer tree.
Create a copy of the node. Returns new instance.
The order in which layers will be rendered on the canvas.

detaileddescription.para: Will only be used if the property hasCustomLayerOrder is true. If you need the current layer order that is active, prefer using layerOrder().

briefdescription.para: Determines if the layer order should be derived from the layer tree or if a custom override order shall be used instead.
The order in which layers will be rendered on the canvas.

detaileddescription.para: Depending on hasCustomLayerOrder, this will return either the override customLayerOrder or the layer order derived from the tree. This property is read only.

briefdescription.para: Load the layer order from an XML element.

detaileddescription.para: Make sure that this is only called after the layers are loaded.

briefdescription.para: The order in which layers will be rendered on the canvas.

detaileddescription.para: Will only be used if the property hasCustomLayerOrder is true. If you need the current layer order that is active, prefer using layerOrder().

briefdescription.para: The order in which layers will be rendered on the canvas.

detaileddescription.para: Will only be used if the property hasCustomLayerOrder is true. If you need the current layer order that is active, prefer using layerOrder().

briefdescription.para: Determines if the layer order should be derived from the layer tree or if a custom override order shall be used instead.
Write layer tree to XML.
Emitted when the custom layer order has changed.
Emitted when the hasCustomLayerOrder flag changes.
Emitted when the layer order has changed.
Copy constructor.
Namespace with helper functions for layer tree operations.

detaileddescription.para: Only generally useful routines should be here. Miscellaneous utility functions for work with the layer tree are in QgsLayerTreeUtils class.
